snippet: Angelo Sosa is the chef creating the small-plate menu.
abstract: Angelo Sosa is the chef creating the small-plate menu.
lead_paragraph: Mexican restaurants all over town have scores of tequilas on the bar, but at Anejo Tequileria y Restaurante, opening next Tuesday in Hell's Kitchen, a carefully curated selection of about two dozen tequilas, mezcals and also bottles of a similar, less known distillate from Chihuahua in the north, sotol, take center stage.

headline.main: At Añejo, Food to Complement Tequila
